home.headline: MERN Stack Developer
home.subline: I'm Muhammad Ahtasham Aslam, a skilled MERN Stack Developer based in Lahore. With experience in developing secure, responsive web applications, I bring digital ideas to life through clean, efficient code.

about.label: About
about.title: About Me
about.description: Meet Ahtasham, a proficient MERN Stack Developer from Lahore

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Muhammad Ahtasham Aslam is a Lahore-based MERN Stack Developer with a passion for creating secure and responsive web applications. With extensive experience in frameworks like Next.js, Electron.js, and blockchain integration, Ahtasham specializes in the convergence of design and technology to solve complex challenges.

Beard Brother Technologies.achievements: Developed responsive web applications using MERN stack, Next.js, Material-UI, and Emotion, enhancing performance and user experience.; Developed a desktop VPN application with Electron.js, expanding digital solutions for secure browsing.; Implemented secure authentication with JWT, ensuring robust data privacy.

CodeNinja Inc.achievements: Collaborated with design and back-end teams to develop responsive, user-friendly interfaces using React, Next.js, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.; Ensured cross-browser compatibility and optimized performance for seamless user experiences.; Contributed to debugging and refining UI components to meet project specifications.

Lahore Leads University.description: Bachelor of Studies in Software Engineering, 3.12 CGPA

Frameworks.description: MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js, Next.js, Electron.js, Redux, Material-UI, Emotion

Blockchain.description: Experienced in Ethers.js, Web3.js, Web3modal, and Wagmi, developing secure blockchain-based solutions

Tools.description: GitHub, Jira, Figma, Adobe XD, VS Code, Postman, FileZilla
